text: hi my name is Rebecca and in today's
lesson I'm going to show you a very easy
way to ask the question in English by
using a simple casual expression which
is how about now you can use this in
lots of different ways which I'm going
to describe to you but the important
thing to remember is that it is a casual
and formal kind of question so don't use
it in formal situations but you can
certainly use it with your friends or at
work with your colleagues ok so how do
we use this expression well you can use
it to invite people you could say to
someone how about a movie I'd like to go
somewhere how about a movie or how about
a game of tennis instead of asking the
full question would you like to play a
game of tennis with me you could just
say how about a game of tennis on
Saturday right or how about dinner on
Thursday ok so you can use this for
invitations you can also use it to refer
to people let's say we need someone to
help us with this report right how about
James
or we need someone to look after the
baby tonight how about your parents ok
ok next one time we can use it to refer
to time when you're making arrangements
that have to do with time how about
needing next week how about seeing the
doctor tomorrow at 3 p.m.
how about going out for dinner
on Thursday at 8 p.m. right or you could
just say how about Thursday at 8 would
that be convenient for you right ok
that's 4 time transportation when you're
referring to different kinds of
transportation how about taking a cab
how about going by subway or how about
going by bus right you can also use it
to refer to places how about Oxford
University
have you considered applying there how
about Paris have you ever been there
okay so you could use it to refer to
places as well and also to food and
drink
I'm hungry how about a pizza how about
some dessert right so you can see that
this little expression how about is very
handy and you can use it in lots of
different situations but again in a
casual environment so let me give you a
couple of situations and then you tell
me what you would say so
suppose somebody said hey it's already 2
p.m. I'm really hungry how about lunch
right good next one I feel like going
ouch how about a movie
ok next example let's get together next
week for some coffee how about Thursday
ok see how we use that one next example
we're late for the meeting how about
taking a cab alright and last one we
need to get some medicine soon how about
the pharmacy on Maple Street ok so you
can see with these examples and the ones
that we talked about on the board that
there's a very easy way in which you can
start to ask questions in English
without too much complicated grammar all
right if you'd like to do a quiz on this
and many other subjects in English
please visit our website wwlp.com thanks
for watching
